name: Invisionable
description:
What do you get when you put a lazy graphical designer and committed programmer on a job to design a fog of war game? A game where YOU draw the graphics of course! Make your way through the VAST (4) amount of levels where you use your secret monk ability to 'feel out' the world around you. Draw the level as you go - if you die, whatever parts you've already 'solved' should now be a lot easier to get through.

Be warned - the final level is not for the faint of heart.

P.S.: Runs way better on Firefox most of the time.

Controls:
W,A,D - Move
Left Mouse Button - Throw rocks
Right Mouse Button - Draw
Ctrl+Z - Undo last drawing
M - Toggle music
